|eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 01/2014 |reldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AHG00B-1.6", "EET-4", "E246995" and "1404" (01/2014) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos. See also [http://moskva.beeline.ru/shop/details/router-bilain-smart-box-one/#product-description Beeline SmartBox One].. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://habrahabr.ru/company/beeline/blog/251489/ ''Beeline SmartBox Pro'' on '''Beeline'''] :*[[Beeline SmartBox]] N300 Wireless Router ::CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197D @660MHz ::Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G 16MB ::RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM6AB160TSD-5G 64MB ::WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192CE 802.11bgn 2T2R ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:59612 On '''iXBT''' forums] *[http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=794426 On '''4PDA''' forums] *[http://ingodwetrust.ru/razborka-beeline-smartbox/#more-137 Teardown on '''InGodweTrust'''] (images PCB) ===Custom firmware=== *[http://ingodwetrust.ru/openwrt-flashing/ OpenWRT on '''InGodweTrust'''] *[https://yadi.sk/d/6k49IwchqhjQM OpenWRT N300 1.2] (by ''V.Kredov'') *[https://yadi.sk/d/H9P60nP-3MUXXe OpenWRT build] (by ''PukinDukun'') ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Unofficially }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Serial speed 38400 (38400 8N1) 
 < J22
1 - GND
2 - Tx
3 - Vcc
4 - Rx
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==

[[Has images::internal| ]] ==See also== *[[Beeline SmartBox One]] N600 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL @700MHz :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G 16MB :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16EG-AC 64MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8192CE 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8192DR 2T2R 802.11an *[[Beeline SmartBox One v2]] AC1200 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL @700MHz :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G 16MB :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16EG-AC 64MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8812AR 2T2R 802.11ac *[[Beeline SmartBox Pro]] AC1200 Wireless Router :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz [[MIPS32|MIPS 1004Kc]] :Flash: ''ESMT'' F59L2G81A-25T 256MB (SLC NAND) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CB128M16FP-DI 256MB (DDR3) :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7602E 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7612E 2T2R 802.11ac :Antenna: 2x 3.2dBi (2.4GHz), 2x 4.5dBi (5GHz) [[Category:English Documentation]]
